short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Community mod for the Zombs Royale game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to block incoming friend requests and/or party invites (so gameplay isn't obscured/disturbed), as well as the option to play a sound notification instead.
